item.title: Next Steps
item.description: We learned a lot about web servers: Installing Controlling with systemctl Configuring as a static web server Configuring as a reverse proxy to an application server We did all of this for two different web servers: NGINX and Caddy. There are many more web servers, and there are additional things you can do with web servers. Resources A great place to learn more would be to read through the documentation for both of the web servers introduced in this class.
